data.title: A Venezuela oil revival could set up winners — and losers — in US energy
data.description: Oil prices are already under pressure due to ample supply and weak demand growth, adding strain on US shale producers.
data.content:
Not all American energy companies stand to benefit from a potential revival of Venezuela's oil industry following the US's capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.

data.title: The companies that make your hard disk drives are having a rally of a lifetime
data.description: Hard-drive and storage stocks surged after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang highlighted data storage as a key AI bottleneck at CES.
data.content:
The companies behind some of tech's least glamorous products hard drives and storage are powering a sharp rally on Wall Street.
